data.eml:eml: Two new Mallinella species from southern China (Araneae, Zodariidae)

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Jin, Chi, Zhang, Feng (2013): Two new Mallinella species from southern China (Araneae, Zodariidae). ZooKeys 296: 79-88, DOI: http://dx.doi.org/10.3897/zookeys.296.4622, URL: http://dx.doi.org/10.3897/zookeys.296.4622
